com.mathtastic.controller

Class AskQuestion

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • com.mathtastic.controller.AskQuestion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @WebServlet(urlPatterns="/askQuestion")
public class AskQuestion
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    AskQuestion handles setup for the game logic sent through either the StartGame class or through appleAddition.jsp. It selects a question to ask at random and displays it on appleAdditionAskQuestion.jsp.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
